basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli K-12 (MIC=4 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799 (MIC=16 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium 14028s (MIC=8 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=32 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis C621 (MIC=8 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC>32 µg/ml).
